title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2, either both Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available or neither should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Select both P1 and P2. 
2. Check if both Open Project and Close Project menu items are available.
